homepageDescription: Nweta mkpụrụokwu Igbo ruru puku kwuru puku, ụda mkpọpụta, na ahịrịokwu ọmụmaatụ e ji akwado ndịniihu asụsụ Igbo na nkanụụzụ.
featuresDescription: Dị ka ọrụ isi ndebanye ya ghe oghe, API Igbo chọrọ ịgbanwe nke a site n’ime ka ụzọ e si amụ asụsụ Igbo dịrị ndị Naịjiria na-anọghị na Naịjiria mfe.
Each word is provided with at least one: Mkpụrụokwu ọbụla nwere, o pekasịa mpe, otu nkọwa.
Certain words are accompanied by context: E nwere mkpụrụokwu ndị nwere ọmụmaatụ dabara n’ọnọdu ha na-ekwu maka ya.
Diacritics are used to convey the differ: E ji akara ụda gosipụta ụda dị iche iche e nwere n’asụsụ Igbo.
The Igbo language has many dialects, som: Asụsụ Igbo nwere ọtụtụ olumba. Ụfọdụ mkpụrụokwu gosiri nke a site na ndepụta e depụtara nsụpe olumba ndị ahụ.
Nsịbịdị is writing system was created in: Nsịbịdị bu usoro ede kere na Naijiria
Proverbs are a core aspect of the Igbo l: Ilu Igbo di mkpa akuku nke omenala na asusu Igbo
Enter a word in either English or Igbo t: Akara otu mkpụrụokwu na Bekee ma ọ bụ n’Igbo ka ị hụ ihe banyere ya.
Want to see how this data is getting use: Ị chọrọ ịhụ ka e si ji data a na-arụ ọrụ? Lee na
The Igbo API is the most robust, Igbo-En: API Igbo bụ API ọkọwookwu Igbo na Bekee kachasị ejupụta n’ihe, nke ndị na-elekọta ya bụ ndị ọgbakọ ọrụodo anyị na-eme nkarị.
GitHub stars: Mmadụ {{number}} a ma ama na GitHub
Interested in what you see? Register for: Uche gị, ọ dị n’ihe ị na-ahụ? Deba aha gị ka e nye gị akara API!
